events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as related to a refund request for an incorrect item delivered to the customer.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and further communication.
Hello, Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number to proceed?
To process your refund quickly, can you send us a photo of the incorrect item you received along with the packaging?
Sure, here is the order number 123456 and the photos of the item and packaging as you requested.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
I appreciate your quick response and look forward to receiving the refund shortly.
The refund has been processed successfully and you should see the credited amount in your account soon.
We just wanted to follow up and ensure that you have received your refund without any issues.
As your refund was processed and confirmed, we are closing this support case. Please contact us again if needed.
